translated: The concentration of the preliminary stage of the first concentration is associated with investigation and analysis.üîΩThe concentration of the actual basis of the first concentration is free from investigation but associated with analysis.üîΩThe concentration of the special first concentration is free from both investigation and analysis.

analyzed: yan chad gnyi ga med pas na // 'di na gnyi ga med pa ste //
translated: The concentrations above the special meditative attainment are free from both.üîΩThe concentrations above the special meditative attainment are free from both investigation and analysis.

analyzed: bsam gtan khyad par can yan chad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar ni rtog pa yang med pa dpyod pa yang med pa'o //
translated: The concentrations of the preliminary stage of the second concentration and so on up to the summit of existence are free from both investigation and analysis.üîΩAgain, the sutras state:

original: yang stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang / smon pa med ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs te /
analyzed: yang stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang / smon pa med ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs te /

original: de la / mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam ba dang // 'gog pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa ste /
analyzed: de la / mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam ba dang // 'gog pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa ste /
translated: The concentration associated with the aspects of peace and signlessness that are the aspects of the truth of cessation is the concentration of signlessness.

original: rnam pa bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi pa yin no //
translated: It has four aspects.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni mtshan ma bcu dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin la /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni mtshan ma bcu dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin la /

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te /

analyzed: mtshan ma bcu ni yul lnga dang pho dang mo dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams so //

original: stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du /
analyzed: stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du /

analyzed: 'jug pa'o // bdag med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa nyid de /

original: rnam pa gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis pa yin no //
translated: It has two aspects.

original: smon pa med pa ni /
analyzed: smon pa med pa ni /
translated: The wishlessüîΩis the aspects of the remaining truths.

analyzed: de las gzhan bden rnam pa dang // bden pa lhag ma'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa ste /
translated: Concentration concomitant with the aspects of the remaining truths is the wishless.

original: @76b rnam pa bcu yin no //
analyzed: @76b rnam pa bcu yin no //
translated: It has ten aspects.

original: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang de'i rgyu dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir dang / lam yang gdon mi za bar gzings lta bur dor bar bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir de'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa yin te /

translated: Since one is disgusted with impermanence, suffering, and their causes, and since the path is certainly to be abandoned like a raft, the meditative concentration that has the aspect of that is wishless.

original: de las 'da' bar mngon sum du phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las 'da' bar mngon sum du phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is directly manifest in the transcendence of that.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir stong pa dang bdag med pa dag gis ni yid mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir stong pa dang bdag med pa dag gis ni yid mi 'byung ngo //
translated: One is not disgusted with emptiness and selflessness because they are similar to nirvana.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: These three kinds of meditative concentration are twofold:

original: dag dang dri ma med /
analyzed: dag dang dri ma med /
translated: pure and uncontaminated.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mundane and supramundane.

original: dag pa pa yang yin la zag pa med pa dag kyang yin te /
analyzed: dag pa pa yang yin la zag pa med pa dag kyang yin te /

original: 'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do //

analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams ni gang na lam yod pa na yod do //
translated: The supramundane exist where the path exists.

original: de dag / dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
analyzed: de dag / dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
translated: They are the three doors of liberation.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya'o // yang / stong nyid stong nyid ces la sogs //

analyzed: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The others are the three concentrations:

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa smon pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'o //

analyzed: stong pa nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ming de skad ces bya'o //

analyzed: de dag las / gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par //
translated: From among those,üîΩtwo focus on the nonlearner.

original: mi slob pa la dmigs pa yin //
analyzed: mi slob pa la dmigs pa yin //
translated: They are emptiness and impermanence.

original: ting nge 'dzin gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The other two concentrations focus on the concentration of no learning.

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mi slob pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la stong pa'i rnam par dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness focuses on the concentration of emptiness of no learning in the aspect of emptiness.

analyzed: smon pa med pa smon pa med pa yang mi slob pa'i smon pa med pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par dmigs so //

analyzed: sdug bsngal bar yang ma yin la rgyu la sogs par yang ma yin te /

analyzed: zag pa med pa ni de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro /

analyzed: sun dbyung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa mtshan med ni // zhi bar ma brtags zad pa la //

analyzed: 'gog pa la zhi ba'i rnam par dmigs te /

original: zag pa med pa la so sor brtags pas /
analyzed: zag pa med pa la so sor brtags pas /

analyzed: 'gos pa med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'gog pa dang / gya nom pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par ni ma yin te /

analyzed: mi rtag ba nyid kyi 'gog pa dang / thun mong yin pa nyed kyi phyir dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gzhan 'di dag ni gcig tu zag bcas //

original: dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ste /

translated: The first virtuous meditative stabilization

original: dag pa pa'am /
analyzed: dag pa pa'am /
translated: is either pure or

analyzed: zag pa med pa ni /

analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mtha'i //üîΩgang yin de zag zad 'gyur bsgom //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa 'di ni bdag nyid la nyer bar gtod pa yin te /

analyzed: de'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi kho nar gsungs so zhes grag go //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skabs nas 'ongs ba bshad zin to //

analyzed: nga ni ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i yon tan rnams bstan pa'i skabs yin pas bshang bar bya ste /

original: tshad med pa ni bzhi yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa ni bzhi yin no //

analyzed: byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms te /

analyzed: ci'i phyir bzhi kho na yin zhe na /

analyzed: gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir //
